rev.desc.rev.desc: update start panel, remove dbdict core
Modification for DEVTX BUG11497 and BUG12039,

Sometimes, there are "orphaned" datadict records (in the case that necessitated this fix, a record for upgradehelp existed in the datadict file, but it did NOT exist in dbdict). This application is driven by information in datadict. So, in this particular case here, it tried to regen upgradehelp (because it existed in datadict), but because the file truly is NOT in the system, it abended.
Put a fix so that it only tries to regen a file if the dbdict for it actually exists. This is accomplished by tryin to rinit the fle.
Modified to create the list from the datadict records instead of hard coding a list.
Altered algorythm Now has a list of files to regen on the start panel

So, in this particular case here, it tried to regen upgradehelp (because it existed in datadict), but because the file truly is NOT in the system, it abended.
Put a fix so that it only tries to regen a file if the dbdict for it actually exists. This is accomplished by tryin to rinit the fle.
